cnf.name: AJ
cnf.readSql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM (select aj.AJBH caseNo, aj.SL_BJSLH alarmNo, aj.AJMC caseTitle, aj.AJSTATE caseState, aj.AB caseClass, aj.BZ caseRemarks, aj.ZYAQ caseDesc, aj.FADD detalAddress, aj.FASJCZ happenTimeUp, aj.FASJZZ happenTimeDown, aj.SLFAQH zoneCode, aj.SLJSDW acceptUnitCode, aj.SL_LRSJ acceptTime, aj.ZBDW hostUnitCode, aj.AJZBRY sponsorCode, aj.AJBARP sponsorPhone, aj.AJXBRY assistantCode, aj.LADW reserveC, aj.AJLARY reserveA, aj.CREATEDTIME creatTime, aj.LASTUPDATEDTIME modifyTime from ZHSJ_YWSJ.YB_ASJ_AJ aj where 1=1 AND aj.AB in ('030807','050800','060137','060136','040109','050900','060801','060810','060147','040103','051000','060132','323202','3B0001','020511','310303','372101','372103','372099') AND aj.CREATEDTIME >= to_date('%s', 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') AND aj.CREATEDTIME <= to_date('%s', 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss')) A WHERE ROWNUM <= %d) WHERE RN >= %d

cnf.name: JQ
cnf.readSql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( select jq.AJBH alarmNo, jq.SLJJRY reserveA, jq.SLJJRY_CN reserveB, jq.SLJJDW reserveC, jq.SLJJDW_CN reserveD, jq.SLJJSJ alarmTime, jq.RESERVATION04 alarmPersonName, jq.FADD locationCase, jq.ZYAQ alarmDesc, jq.CREATEDTIME creatTime, jq.LASTUPDATEDTIME modifyTime from ZHSJ_YWSJ.YB_ASJ_JQ jq where 1 = 1 AND jq.ajbh in ( %s ) ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= %d) WHERE RN >= %d

cnf.name: RYQK
cnf.readSql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( select qk.SYSTEMID id, qk.AJBH caseNo, qk.RYBH staffId, qk.RYLX staffType, qk.RYSTATE staffState, qk.CREATEDTIME creatTime, qk.LASTUPDATEDTIME modifyTime from ZHSJ_YWSJ.YB_ASJ_RYSAQK qk where 1 = 1 AND qk.AJBH in ( %s ) ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= %d) WHERE RN >= %d

cnf.name: XYR
cnf.readSql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( select xyr.SYSTEMID staffId, xyr.XM name, xyr.ZJZL idcardType, xyr.ZJHM idcardNum, xyr.XB gender, xyr.LXDH phoneNum, xyr.LRDW entryUnit, xyr.LRR entry, xyr.BZ remark, xyr.CREATEDTIME creatTime, xyr.LASTUPDATEDTIME modifyTime from ZHSJ_YWSJ.YB_ASJ_XYRDJ xyr where 1 = 1 AND xyr.SYSTEMID in ( %s ) ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= %d) WHERE RN >= %d
